name: m2e/fulfillment-by-amazon-fba-multi-channel-mcf-magento-adobe-commerce
description: M2E Amazon Multi-Channel Fulfillment (MCF) is a Magento trusted extension that integrates your Adobe Commerce system with MCF, allowing sellers to use Amazon's Multi-Channel Fulfillment service to ship orders across various sales channels, not just Amazon

suggest.m2e/ebay-amazon-magento2: M2E Pro extension must be installed before proceeding with installation of M2E Amazon MCF module.
